column5: Anyone else finding they are catching less walleye in the slot? I haven’t seen a small walleye in a while. Is the fishery getting depleted? I should add my fishing is tri -lakes.
Only fished Tri lakes once this year opening Sunday. It sucked. All the lakes are behind this year, 5 weeks ago I was in winter coat. The top end of Pigeon should start firing soon.

Im heading to Fenelon Falls this weekend.  Was going to take the canoe and see if I could do a little fishing.  You happen to know any decent spots in the area I could access with a canoe for a quick jig???

The bigguns been on the bite till yesterday mayfly hatch slowed it down been.getting lots of 22-25inch eyes with a couple keepers little more weed growth those smaller fish will show up in better numbers

not me but my best buddies were catching them easy in the tri lakes. That heat wave after the snow really really screwed everything up everywhere it seems. Had the fishing tough across the province from what I can tell. Things are shaping up nicely now though and im seeing more catches.
A little later season than normal so not really surprising! Rice Lake had a little dry spell but seem to be firing all cylinders right now!
